author: LawrenceHwang
body:
Hello team and community,

I was wondering if you could release PowerShell Core for Aplie Linux **32 bit** in addition to the existing 64bit release? I am looking to run PowerShell Core on iOS via the Linux Shell emulator, iSH, which emulates Alpine Linux in x86 usermode. I totally understand this can be a long shot due to the rare use case and really appreciate your consideration.


Appendix:
iSH: https://ish.app/


Thank you,

Lawrence

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
PowerShell Core is based on .Net Core that only support x64 Alpine https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/3.0/3.0-supported-os.md

Please open request in .Net Core repo.

comments.author: noaboa97
comments.body:
Please correct me if I‘m wrong. As of my understanding, dotnetcore is now available for Alpine 32bit. https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/2021 Search for: Linux-musl-arm https://github.com/dotnet/installer
GitHub
GitHub - dotnet/installer: .NET SDK Installer
.NET SDK Installer. Contribute to dotnet/installer development by creating an account on GitHub.

comments.author: iSazonov

title: Add Alpine Linux 32bit release
